title: Instructor Form
policyTypeLabel: Select the type of coaching coverage you wish to purchase:
requires5MilLabel: Please select the amount of insurance coverage required:
coachConcussionLabel: Do you have formal training regarding concussion recognition?
concussionManagementLabel: Do you have written concussion management policy that is compliant with current Health Canada / federal legislation?
concussionManagementDescription: Resources concerning concussion management can be found in the top bar under tools.
concussionManagementDistributeLabel: Do you distribute the written policy to coaches, parents and players and require parents' written acknowledgment that they have received and reviewed?/ federal legislation?
concussionManagementDistributeDescriptio: Resources concerning concussion management can be found in the top bar under tools.
acknowledgeExclusionLabel: I acknowledge that participants suspected of a head injury must be removed from play immediately. The participants must be cleared by a licensed healthcare provider to rejoin play.
nonOwnedLiabilityLabel: Please select the amount of non-owned auto insurance coverage you wish to add:
nonOwnedValidLicenseLabel: Does every driver of the vehicles have a valid drivers' license?
nonOwnedTransportLabel: Are you responsible for providing transportation and/or chauffeuring services, or transporting attendees?
nonOwnedRentingLabel: Do you have any short term rental vehicles (less than 30 days)?
nonOwnedPhysicalDamageLabel: Do you require physical damage coverage for the short term rental vehicles?
nonOwnedPhysicalDamageAmountLabel: What limit of physical damage coverage is required per vehicle?
